title: 中印边境，我国又丢失六个山头，你如何看？
contents:
在过去的20天里，印度军队在中国边境上占领了6个新的山丘，击败了解放军。 印度还捕获了Mokhapari，这是Finger 4山脊线的最高峰。

The Indian Army has captured 6 new hills on the China border in the last 20 days, beating the PLA. India also captured Mokhapari, the biggest peak on Finger 4 ridge line.
#IndiaChinaFaceoff #Ladakh
